fr.sii.ogham.core.builder

Class TemplateBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sii.ogham.core.builder.TemplateBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Builder<TemplateParser>, TemplateParserBuilder

    public class TemplateBuilder
extends Object
implements TemplateParserBuilder
    A specialized builder for template management. It helps construct the template engines. By default, the builder construct the following engines:
    • ThymeleafParser (delegate construction to ThymeleafTemplateParserBuilder)
    By default, the builder will use the following template resolvers:
    • Resolver that is able to handle classpath resolution ( ClassPathResolver)
    • Resolver that is able to handle file resolution ( FileResolver)
    • Resolver that is able to handle string directly ( StringResourceResolver)
    This builder is also able to register a parent path and an extension for template resolution. The aim is to be able to provide only the name of the template without needing to provide the full path to it.
    Author:
    Aur√©lien Baudet

        public TemplateBuilder()

    • Method Detail

      • useDefaults

        public TemplateBuilder useDefaults()
        Tells the builder to use all default behaviors and values. It will enable the following template engines:
        • ThymeleafParser with the associated detector ( ThymeleafTemplateDetector) by calling withThymeleaf()
        It will also use the default template resolvers:
        • Resolver that is able to handle classpath resolution ( ClassPathResolver)
        • Resolver that is able to handle file resolution ( FileResolver)
        • Resolver that is able to handle string directly ( StringResourceResolver)
        If the system properties provide values for parent path ( ogham.template.prefix) and extension (ogham.template.suffix), then the builder will use them. If no value defined for these properties, then empty strings will be used.
        Returns:
        this builder instance for fluent use

      • useDefaults

        public TemplateBuilder useDefaults(Properties properties)
        Tells the builder to use all default behaviors and values. It will enable the following template engines:
        • ThymeleafParser with the associated detector ( ThymeleafTemplateDetector)
        It will also use the default template resolvers (by calling useDefaultResolvers()):
        • Resolver that is able to handle classpath resolution ( ClassPathResolver)
        • Resolver that is able to handle file resolution ( FileResolver)
        • Resolver that is able to handle string directly ( StringResourceResolver)
        If the provided properties provide values for parent path ( ogham.template.prefix) and extension (ogham.template.suffix), then the builder will use them. If no value defined for these properties, then empty strings will be used.
        Parameters:
        properties - indicate which properties to use instead of using the system ones
        Returns:
        this builder instance for fluent use

      • registerTemplateParser

        public TemplateBuilder registerTemplateParser(TemplateParserBuilder builder)
        Register a specialized builder for a particular template engine. Using this method will associate a detector to this engine that will accept all templates.
        Parameters:
        builder - the builder to register
        Returns:
        this builder instance for fluent use

      • registerTemplateParser

        public TemplateBuilder registerTemplateParser(TemplateParserBuilder builder,
                                              TemplateEngineDetector detector)
        Register a specialized builder for a particular template engine. It also registers the associated detector to indicate if the engine can handle the templates at runtime.
        Parameters:
        builder - the builder to register
        detector - the detector that indicates if the engine can handle the provided template at runtime
        Returns:
        this builder instance for fluent use

      • useDefaultResolvers

        public TemplateBuilder useDefaultResolvers()
        Tells the builder to use the default template resolvers:
        • Resolver that is able to handle classpath resolution ( ClassPathResolver). The lookup prefix is "classpath:"
        • Resolver that is able to handle file resolution ( FileResolver). The lookup is "file:"
        • Resolver that is able to handle string directly ( StringResourceResolver). The lookup is "string:"
        • Default resolver if no lookup is used ( ClassPathResolver)
        This method is automatically called by useDefaults() or useDefaults(Properties).
        Returns:
        this builder instance for fluent use
        See Also:
        FirstSupportingResourceResolverBuilder

      • withResourceResolverBuilder

        public TemplateBuilder withResourceResolverBuilder(FirstSupportingResourceResolverBuilder resolverBuilder)
        Tells the builder to use your own builder for template resolution.
        Parameters:
        resolverBuilder - the builder to use instead of default one
        Returns:
        this builder instance for fluent use

      • withThymeleaf

        public TemplateBuilder withThymeleaf()
        Enable Thymeleaf template engine. This engine is used only if the associated detector (ThymeleafTemplateDetector) indicates that Thymeleaf is able to handle the provided template.
        Returns:
        this builder instance for fluent use

      • withFreeMarker

        public TemplateBuilder withFreeMarker()
        Enable FreeMarker template engine. This engine is used only if the associated detector (FreeMarkerTemplateDetector) indicates that FreeMarker is able to handle the provided template.
        Returns:
        this builder instance for fluent use

      • setParentPathKey

        public TemplateBuilder setParentPathKey(String parentPathKey)
        Change the default property key for template resolution parent path. By default, the property key is ogham.template.prefix (see TemplateConstants.PREFIX_PROPERTY). Use this method to change the key.
        Parameters:
        parentPathKey - the new property key for template resolution parent path
        Returns:
        this instance for fluent use

      • setExtensionKey

        public TemplateBuilder setExtensionKey(String extensionKey)
        Change the default property key for template resolution extension. By default, the property key is ogham.template.suffix (see TemplateConstants.SUFFIX_PROPERTY). Use this method to change the key.
        Parameters:
        extensionKey - the new property key for template resolution extension
        Returns:
        this instance for fluent use

      • build

        public TemplateParser build()
                     throws BuildException
        Build the template parser according to options previously enabled. If only one template engine has been activated then the parser will be this template engine parser. If there are several activated engines, then the builder will generate an AutoDetectTemplateParser. This kind of parser is able to detect which parser to use according to the provided template at runtime. The auto-detection is delegated to each defined TemplateEngineDetector associated with each engine. The builder will also construct a template resolver based on the previously defined mappings. This mapping is done using a FirstSupportingResourceResolver. It uses a map indexed by the lookup string (classpath, file, ...) and the resolver implementation as value. The builder will also provide the previously defined parent path and extension to the resolvers and to the delegated builders.
        Specified by:
        build in interface Builder<TemplateParser>
        Returns:
        The parser implementation for templating system. If only one template engine defined, then use it directly. Otherwise use the auto-detection feature to automatically detect at runtime which engine to use
        Throws:
        BuildException - when the builder can't construct the parser

      • getParserBuilder

        public <B extends TemplateParserBuilder> B getParserBuilder(Class<B> clazz)
        Get reference to the specialized builder. It may be useful to fine tune the template engine.
        Type Parameters:
        B - the type of the class to get
        Parameters:
        clazz - the class of the parser builder to get
        Returns:
        the template parser builder instance
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - when provided class references an nonexistent builder

      • getThymeleafParser

        public ThymeleafTemplateParserBuilder getThymeleafParser()

        Get the reference to the specialized builder for Thymeleaf. It may be useful to fine tune Thymeleaf engine.

        Access this builder if you want to:
        • Use your own Thymeleaf template engine
        • Customize the lookup resolution for Thymeleaf
        • Customize the adapters
        Returns:
        The Thymeleaf builder

      • getFreeMarkerParser

        public FreeMarkerTemplateParserBuilder getFreeMarkerParser()

        Get the reference to the specialized builder for Thymeleaf. It may be useful to fine tune Thymeleaf engine.

        Access this builder if you want to:
        • Use your own Thymeleaf template engine
        • Customize the lookup resolution for Thymeleaf
        • Customize the adapters
        Returns:
        The Thymeleaf builder

      • getResolverBuilder

        public FirstSupportingResourceResolverBuilder getResolverBuilder()

        Get the builder used to handle resource resolution.

        Access this builder if you want to:
        • Customize how template resources are resolved
        • Register a custom lookup mapping resolver for template resources
        Returns:
        the builder used to handle resource resolution
